mosinstall.name: Table - Contact Category
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: Shows a Table view of Contact items for a particular Category

param.name: menu_image
param.label: Menu Image
param.description: A small image to be placed to the left or right of your menu item, images must be in images/stories/

param.name: pageclass_sfx
param.label: Page Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual page styling

param.name: back_button
param.label: Back Button
param.description: Show/Hide a Back Button, that returns you to the previously view page

param.name: header
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Text to display at the top of the page. If left blank, the Menu name will be used instead

param.name: other_cat
param.label: Other Categories
param.description: When viewing a Category, Show/Hide the list of other Categories

param.name: cat_description
param.label: Category Description
param.description: Show/Hide the Description for the list of other catgeories

param.name: cat_items
param.label: # Category Items
param.description: Show/Hide the number of items in each category

param.name: bannedEmail
param.label: Banned Email
param.description: Emails containing any of the text will be banned, separate different words with semi-colons e.g. ban;text;etc

param.name: bannedSubject
param.label: Banned Subject
param.description: Subjects containing any of the text will be banned, separate different words with semi-colons e.g. ban;text;etc

param.name: bannedText
param.label: Banned Text
param.description: Text containing any of the text will be banned, separate different words with semi-colons e.g. ban;text;etc

param.name: session
param.label: Session Check
param.description: Check for existance of session cookie, this means that users without cookies will not be able to send emails
